name: Nothing to lose (except your deposit)
description:
A wizard has created the first physical manifestation of 'Nothing', the problem is, it destroys anything it comes in contact with! Can you help him guide it out of his tower before you cause too much damage?

Us the mouse to control The 'Nothing' to guide it out while avoiding walls and gems, use the left and right mouse buttons to rotate

No sound
Press R to restart the game
